item.title: 解决法律纠纷后，Uniper 上调了今年的业绩展望
item.description: 在解决了长期的法律纠纷后，Uniper SE 提高了 2024 年的盈利预测。【原文：Uniper SE increased its earnings forecast for 2024 after the German utility settled long-running legal disputes.】

item.title: 阿斯利康的恩赫图在中国被调查仍获报销
item.description: 中国批准了阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）的乳腺癌治疗药物在国家医疗保险中报销，此举将促进这家英国制药商在中国的销售，而该公司正在进行的一项调查正牵涉到公司的一些高级管理人员。【原文：China approved AstraZeneca Plc’s blockbuster breast cancer treatment for reimbursement by state-run medical insurance, a move that will boost the British drugmaker’s sales in the country in the midst of an ongoing probe that’s ensnared some of its senior executives.】

item.title: 法国预算危机令买家对进一步动荡望而却步
item.description: 在本周政治紧张局势突然爆发后，投资者纷纷避开法国资产，认为动荡时期远未结束。【原文：Investors are steering clear of French assets after a sudden flare-up in political tension this week, betting that the volatile period is far from over.】

item.title: 欧佩克+代表称将供应问题在线会议推迟至 12 月 5 日
item.description: 据不愿透露姓名的代表称，欧佩克+将把周日的石油限产在线会议推迟到 12 月 5 日。【原文：OPEC+ will delay Sunday’s online meeting on oil production curbs to Dec. 5, according to delegates who asked not to be identified.】

item.title: 盒马鲜生首次公开募股即告上涨，创 2017 年以来南非最大首次公开募股纪录
item.description: 盒马鲜生零售有限公司（Boxer Retail Ltd.）在约翰内斯堡的首次公开募股中大涨，这是南非自 2017 年以来最大的首次公开募股。【原文：Boxer Retail Ltd. surged in its Johannesburg debut following South Africa’s biggest initial public offering since 2017.】

item.title: 东京燃气公司在埃利奥特投资后酝酿房地产方案
item.description: 日本最大的公用事业天然气供应商表示，在一名激进投资者盯上该公司的房地产后，该公司将考虑采取各种措施来释放其房地产资产的价值，包括可能出售一些没有得到有效利用的资产。【原文：Japan’s biggest utility gas provider said it will consider a variety of measures to unlock the value of its real estate assets, including potentially selling some that are not efficiently used, after an activist investor targeted the firm’s properties.】

item.title: 重回边缘，SAS 希望法航荷航增持其股份
item.description: SAS AB 在经历了艰难的破产保护计划三个月后，希望在欧洲航空公司整合中发挥作用，向其部分所有者法航-荷航（Air France-KLM）宣传自己是吸引斯堪的纳维亚富裕旅客的渠道。【原文：Three months after exiting a bruising bankruptcy-protection plan, SAS AB wants to play a role in European airline consolidation by pitching itself to part-owner Air France-KLM as an attractive conduit to well-heeled Scandinavian travelers.】

item.title: 经济学家称英国企业增税可能导致 13 万个工作岗位流失
item.description: 据彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）分析，英国财政大臣蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）向企业增税 260 亿英镑（约合 330 亿美元），如果老板们选择通过减少就业来转嫁负担，可能会损失多达 13 万个工作岗位。【原文：UK Chancellor Rachel Reeves’ £26 billion ($33 billion) tax hike on businesses may cost as many as 130,000 jobs if bosses choose to pass on the burden by reducing employment, according to analysis by Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将走高，英镑下滑
东南亚暴雨淹没农场并迫使人们撤离
item.description: 东南亚部分地区的暴雨和山洪阻碍了棕榈和橡胶种植园的工作，中断了电力供应，迫使数千人撤离。【原文：Heavy rains and flash floods in parts of Southeast Asia have hampered work at palm and rubber plantations, interrupted power supply and forced the evacuation of thousands of people.】

item.title: 干邑制造商认为美国经济复苏缓慢，人头马销量下降
item.description: 人头马君度 SA 预测全年销售额下降幅度低于预期，并表示美国市场至少要到今年年底才能复苏。【原文：Remy Cointreau SA forecast a lower-than-expected fall in annual sales and said the US market will not recover until at least the end of the year.】

item.title: 为什么世界大国都在争夺计算机芯片？
item.description: 计算机芯片是数字经济的引擎室，其不断增长的功能正在促成有望改变多个行业的生成式人工智能等技术。冠状病毒大流行扰乱了亚洲的芯片生产，使全球技术供应链陷入混乱，凸显了芯片的关键作用。【原文：Computer chips are the engine room of the digital economy, and their growing capabilities are enabling technologies such as generative artificial intelligence that promise to transform multiple industries. Their critical role was highlighted when the coronavirus pandemic disrupted chip production in Asia, tipping global technology supply chains into chaos.】

item.title: 泰国交易所将利用人工智能改进对上市公司的监管
item.description: 泰国证券交易所计划利用人工智能工具加强对上市公司的监控，以应对日益增多的公司欺诈事件。【原文：Thailand’s stock exchange plans to use artificial intelligence tools to improve monitoring of listed companies as it grapples with rising instances of corporate fraud.】

item.title: 英国人将房屋赠与家人以逃避不断增加的税收
item.description: 今年，越来越多的英国房屋将免费转让，因为房主希望通过将资产传给家人来逃避不断增加的税收。【原文：An ever increasing number of UK homes are set to be passed on for free this year as homeowners seek to escape rising taxes by passing on assets to family members.】

item.title: 英国私募股权公司创始人科勒为 50 亿美元的《财富》杂志任命首席执行官
item.description: 杰里米-科勒（Jeremy Coller）是英国最大的金融财富之一背后的私募股权创始人，他聘请萨拉-马塞多（Sara Macedo）担任其家族办公室的首任首席执行官，因为他要在以自己名字命名的投资公司之外建立控股公司。【原文：Jeremy Coller, the private equity founder behind one of the UK’s biggest finance fortunes, hired Sara Macedo as the first chief executive officer of his family office as he builds holdings outside his namesake investment firm.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德敦促欧洲就贸易问题进行谈判而非报复
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，如果欧盟与美国就潜在的贸易关税问题进行谈判，而不是立即采取反制措施，欧盟可能会处于更有利的地位。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde suggested European Union might be in a better position if it talks with the US about potential trade tariffs instead of immediately imposing countermeasures.】

item.title: Seven & I 保证金购买飙升，收购竞赛愈演愈烈
item.description: 投资者利用借贷资金购买 Seven & i 控股公司股票的数量达到了至少十年来的最高水平，该公司创始家族迅速收购日本零售业巨头的希望与日俱增。【原文：Investors are buying Seven & i Holdings Co. shares using borrowed funds by the most in at least a decade, amid growing hopes of a speedy takeover of the Japanese retail giant by its founding family.】

item.title: 美元走强削弱吸引力，外国人逃离印尼股市
item.description: 由于美元走强削弱了新兴市场资产的吸引力，外国投资者对印尼股市日益警惕，股票连续第 15 个交易日流出。【原文：Foreign investors are growing wary of Indonesian stocks, with equity outflows reaching the 15th straight session, as a stronger dollar dented the appeal of emerging-market assets.】

item.title: 喜力计划在迪拜建造海湾地区首家大型啤酒厂
item.description: 喜力公司（Heineken NV）的一家合资企业计划开始在迪拜生产广受欢迎的啤酒品牌，迪拜将迎来海湾地区第一家大型啤酒厂，这对于一个长期严格限制酒类销售和消费的地区来说，是一个具有里程碑意义的举措。【原文：Dubai is poised to get the Gulf’s first large-scale brewery as a Heineken NV joint venture plans to start producing popular beer brands in the emirate, a landmark move for a region that’s long had strict restrictions around the sale and consumption of alcohol.】

item.title: 全球最大的黄金买家现在是东欧各国央行
item.description: 今年早些时候，捷克央行行长飞抵伦敦，参观了英格兰银行位于 Threadneedle 街地下的混凝土保险库中堆积如山的金条。【原文：Earlier this year, the Czech Republic’s central bank chief flew to London to have a look at a swelling stack of gold bars stored in the Bank of England’s concrete-encased vaults beneath Threadneedle Street.】

item.title: 亿万富翁 Grifols 家族退出布鲁克菲尔德公司后的困境成为焦点
item.description: 对于西班牙的亿万富翁 Grifols 家族来说，布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）将其陷入困境的同名公司私有化的计划，是使其扭亏为盈的一种方式，而且是远离市场的一种方式。【原文：For Spain’s billionaire Grifols family, which turned a blood-collection business into one of the world’s largest medical fortunes, Brookfield Asset Management’s plan to take its troubled eponymous company private had been a way to turn it around — far from the glare of markets.】

item.title: 夏季来临，澳大利亚野火风险升高
item.description: 季节性展望显示，澳大利亚一些重要的葡萄酒产区、大片牧场和地区城镇今年夏天将面临更高的野火风险。【原文：Some of Australia’s key wine growing regions, along with vast tracts of grazing land and regional towns, are facing higher risks of wildfires this summer, according to a seasonal outlook.】

item.title: 日本和中国市场持续低迷，丰田汽车产销量停滞不前
item.description: 丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor Co.【原文：Toyota Motor Co.’s sales and production plateaued last month, buoyed by a slight rebound abroad after a prolonged slump in Japan.】

item.title: 穆迪将斯里兰卡列入信用评级升级审查名单
item.description: 由于斯里兰卡即将完成美元债券重组，穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）正在审查斯里兰卡主权信用评级的升级事宜。【原文：Moody’s Ratings is reviewing Sri Lanka’s sovereign credit rating for an upgrade, as the nation is set to complete the restructuring of its dollar bonds.】

item.title: 日元大幅波动，套利交易商为紧张假期做准备
item.description: 日元的再次波动意味着利差交易者在感恩节期间很可能得不到什么喘息的机会。【原文：The yen’s renewed volatility means that carry traders are likely to get little respite over Thanksgiving.】

item.title: NHK 称日本内阁将批准 920 亿美元额外预算
item.description: 据日本国家广播公司（NHK）报道，日本将在 13.9 万亿日元（约合 920 亿美元）的追加预算中大量依靠额外税收来为首相石破茂的经济刺激计划提供资金。【原文：Japan will lean heavily on extra tax revenue in a ¥13.9 trillion ($92 billion) additional budget to finance Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s stimulus package, according to state broadcaster NHK.】

item.title: 据说 GCash 将考虑在菲律宾进行创纪录的首次公开募股，金额高达 15 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，菲律宾最大的金融科技平台 GCash 已邀请银行参与在马尼拉的首次公开募股，可能募集 10 亿至 15 亿美元。【原文：GCash, the biggest fintech platform in the Philippines, has invited banks to pitch for an initial public offering in Manila to potentially raise $1 billion to $1.5 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞穗考虑推出新举措，瞄准印度私募股权投资热潮
item.description: 瑞穗金融集团（Mizuho Financial Group Inc.【原文：Mizuho Financial Group Inc. is considering making a push into a new area for the lender in India focusing on private equity and venture capital firms, seeking to tap some of the most prolific dealmakers in the country.】

item.title: 丝绸称新西兰央行利率轨迹暗示 2 月后放缓宽松步伐
item.description: 新西兰央行行长助理卡伦-希尔克（Karen Silk）表示，新西兰央行的最新预测表明，在2月份连续第三次降息半个百分点后，央行将放缓宽松步伐，并可能将暂停纳入宽松周期。【原文：The New Zealand central bank’s latest projections imply it will slow the pace of easing and likely incorporate pauses into the cycle after a third straight half-percentage point cut in February, Assistant Governor Karen Silk said.】

item.title: 惠誉评级称中国房地产市场低迷可能延续至 2025 年
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）称，尽管政府采取了刺激措施来刺激需求，但由于价格和销售依然疲软，中国长达数年的房地产危机将在 2025 年持续下去。【原文：China’s multiyear property crisis is set to drag on in 2025 as prices and sales remain weak despite the government’s stimulus push to spur demand, according to Fitch Ratings.】
